title: Numeric Password
description: Find numeric passwords. For security, they must contain a specific number of digits and nothing else.
solutionSummary: This pattern uses `^` and `$` anchors to ensure the entire string is matched. `\d` is a shorthand for any digit (0-9), and `{6}` is a quantifier that specifies the preceding element (`\d`) must appear exactly six times. This combination validates a 6-digit numeric code.
